name: ketoneboiler
title: Hot Fluoroketone Flamethrowers
description: Feed hot fluoroketone to flamethrower turrets. Generally nerfs flamethrower turret damage and fluid consumption overall (settings are configurable). Feeding hot fluoroketone is on par with vanilla light-oil flame damage. Also adds a boiler to heat up your cold fluoroketone.
author: Dobberoonski
